title: Buddha Restorans
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Beer/Wine, Catering, European, Latvian
description: A trendy, fine dining vegetarian restaurant with a bar. Its sit-out terrace offers view of Freedom Monument and Latvian National Opera House. Order from a main menu, a breakfast menu, dinner menu, and seasonal dishes. Live DJ from 7-11pm.
